recipesJson.name: Caramel Almond Custard
recipesJson.author: coop34
recipesJson.description: Give this one 2 week min, and it really starts to take shape. Caramel fades slightly and almond comes out more. And of course custard just gets better with time. After a full month it's really good. I was aiming for something different, and hit the mark!

reviews.text: This is a very decadent mix. I really enjoy vaping this good work. It is balanced beautifully sir.
Very nice custard!! This and your Raspberry Custard are my two favorite custard vapes and that's saying a lot! Great job Coop can't wait to see what other gems you put out in the future!

This is definitely my favorite custard and I've tried so many custard recipes over the last two years. I would say give it at least 3 weeks of aging before vaping this delicious smooth caramel almond custard.
